(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
cards.flavour:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat -
Tell you all about it when I got the time

cards.name: Let It Go
cards.action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
cards.flavour:
It's time to see what I can do
To test the limits and break through

cards.name: Dinglehopper
cards.action: <mark>STRAIGHTEN HAIR</mark> ↷ - Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.
cards.flavour: Enjoy the finest of human hairstyles.

cards.name: Yzma
cards.title: Alchemist
cards.action: <mark>YOU'RE EXCUSED</mark> Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavour: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

cards.name: Scar
cards.title: Fiery Usurper
cards.flavour: Consumed by the flames of ambition.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.title: Wayward Sorcerer
cards.action:
ANIMATE BROOM You pay 1 ⬡ less to play Broom characters.
 CEASELESS WORKER Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.
cards.flavour: He always goes for the clean sweep.

cards.name: Maurice
cards.title: World-Famous Inventor
cards.action:
GIVE IT A TRY Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
 IT WORKS! Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Cheshire Cat
cards.title: Not All There
cards.action: <mark>Lose something?</mark> When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
cards.flavour: "You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."

cards.name: Goofy
cards.title: Daredevil
cards.action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
cards.flavour: Sometimes you gotta give it the ol’ jump and hyuck.

cards.name: Tigger
cards.title: Wonderful Thing
cards.action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
cards.flavour: "I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"

cards.name: Lady Tremaine
cards.title: Wicked Stepmother
cards.action: <mark>Do it again!</mark> When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.
cards.flavour: "If your chores are done, then clearly you..."

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.title: Brave Little Tailor
cards.action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
cards.flavour: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.title: Tiny Tactician
cards.action: <mark>Battle plans</mark> ↷ - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
cards.flavour: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.

cards.name: Gantu
cards.title: Galactic Federation Captain
cards.action: <mark>Under arrest</mark> Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.
cards.flavour: "Relax, enjoy the trip... and don't get any ideas!"

cards.name: White Rabbit's Pocket Watch
cards.action: I'm late! ↷, 1 ⬡ - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
cards.flavour: "No wonder you're late. Why, this clock is exactly two days slow." −The Mad Hatter

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.title: Prince Ali
cards.action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
cards.flavour: Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic.

cards.name: Scar
cards.title: Mastermind
cards.action: <mark>Insidious plot</mark> When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 ※ this turn.
cards.flavour: "The best plans involve a little danger. Just not for me."

cards.name: The Wardrobe
cards.title: Belle's Confidant
cards.flavour: When you simply must have the hautest couture.

cards.name: Healing Glow
cards.action: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
cards.flavour: “Don't freak out!” Rapunzel

cards.name: Magic Mirror
cards.action: <mark>Speak</mark> ↷, 4 ⬡ - Draw a card.
cards.flavour: "What wouldst thou know, my Queen?"

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.title: Forceful Duelist
cards.action: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character get +2 ※.)
cards.flavour: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

cards.name: Elsa
cards.title: Snow Queen
cards.action: <mark>Freeze</mark> ↷ - Exert chosen opposing character.
cards.flavour: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an unfamiliar new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

cards.name: Cruella De Vil
cards.title: Miserable As Usual
cards.action: <mark>You'll Be Sorry</mark> When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
cards.flavour: When she stops by, misery is company.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.title: Monstrous Dragon
cards.action: <mark>Dragon Fire</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.
cards.flavour: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

cards.name: Robin Hood
cards.title: Unrivaled Archer
cards.action:
Feed The Poor When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
Good Shot During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
cards.flavour: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

cards.name: Stitch
cards.title: Rock Star
cards.action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
Adoring Fans Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.
cards.flavour: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

cards.name: Hades
cards.title: King of Olympus
cards.action:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.)
Sinister plot This character gets +1 ◆ for every other Villain character you have in play.
cards.flavour: Oh hey, I'm gonna need new business cards.

cards.name: Mulan
cards.title: Imperial Soldier
cards.action: <mark>Lead by example</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 ◆ this turn.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.title: Sinister Visitor
cards.flavour: „The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel...“

cards.name: Moana
cards.title: Of Motunui
cards.action: <mark>WE CAN FIX IT</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. They can‘t quest for the rest of this turn.
cards.flavour: „I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boat, sailacross the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti.“

cards.name: Simba
cards.title: Returned King
cards.action:
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 ※.)
POUNCE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
cards.flavour: „I‘ll do whatever it takes to save my kingdom.“

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.title: Detective
cards.action: <mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
cards.flavour: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

cards.name: Aurora
cards.title: Dreaming Guardian
cards.action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
Protective Embrace Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
cards.flavour: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.

cards.name: Pascal
cards.title: Rapunzel's Companion
cards.action: CAMOUFLAGE While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
cards.flavour: A true friend is always there for you, whether you cansee them or not.

cards.name: Jumba Jookiba
cards.title: Renegade Scientist
cards.flavour: "Created something? Ha! But that would be irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever . . . make more than one."

cards.name: Olaf
cards.title: Friendly Snowman
cards.flavour: "I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!"

cards.name: Dragon Fire
cards.action: Banish chosen character.
cards.flavour: Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.
